name: Don't Dance
description:
The grumpy monster want's to sleep, but the dancing critters  keep him awake!

push or smash to separate the critters then run back to bed. 

you win if you get to sleep

you lose if all critters are dancing for a few seconds.

tip : push a stunned critter into a cage to keep them stunned.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

W,A,S,D to move 

SPACE to smash

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made in <48 non-consecutive hours for miziziziz game jam.
